core:processNote.core:description: The ViewTimeout event must clear up and terminate the process without continuing or using existing states or actions.

core:action.core:comment: If product code entered, stop the background promotion calculation, if still in progress.
We must check that PromotionCalculationComplete event just delivered has the id we're expecting and isn't an earlier one that made it through.
Safety check that basket savings processing has been run when we get here
If product code entered, stop the background promotion calculation, if still in progress.

core:promptState.core:comment: Keep-open state that responds to PromotionCalculationComplete event to complete the basket update.
